Name: Chased
About the game: Chased is a single-player horror game. Escaping from various levels and moving on to the next one while still alive are the most crucial aspects of this game. Levels Although there is currently only one level in this game, future updates will add many more diverse levels. Entities Currently, there is only one entity that will hunt you and attempt to murder you, but there will be many more in the future. Energy Your energy is limited in this game, so be careful how you spend it. Traps You can evade the game's traps by crouching, but if you won't they will stun you and give the monster an advantage in catching you.
